mdRecord.dcterms:description: Describes troop movements -- his unit from Staunton to Winchester, where he is writing, and other units to arrive following evacuation of Harpers Ferry. Some skirmishing is mentioned and a spoiled box of food.
There are three files available: a PDF transcription, a plain text transcription, and a PDF which was created from scans of the original document.
